Posts.Content: my sister's pathology report shows 7 positive nodes and she has stage 3 breast cancer. She had a radical mastectomy recently and I want to know the significance of the 7 positive nodes and a prognosis.  Anyone? Thanks, BJ5053
Posts.Title: positive nodes

Posts.Content: Caroline, Thank you for your reply and the good news about your situation.  You are right each diagnosis is very individual. I am just attempting to learn as much as I can about what she may be facing and how I can be helpful to her.  I am trying to be optimistic and she is too, but sometimes it is hard.  Thanks again,
Posts.Title: positive nodes

Posts.Content: Stage 3 breast cancer with 7 positive nodes; now a PET scan and brain scan is needed.... just for the cocktail or is this much more serious?  Sister is so worried about mets.  Any information? Thanks
Posts.Title: PET and Brain Scan
